title: Lungs
creator_credit: A K Lee, D Morgan and Educational Media International
brief_description: Discusses the structure, function and mechanism of the lungs. The overall structure of the lungs and air passage is presented by means of a sheep dissection and a living lung is seen during a routine operationat a veterinary clinic. The movement of the diaphragm and ribs is clearly highlighted by X-ray.
